name: 48 Hrs Game Jam Simulator
description:
48 Hrs. Game Jam Simulator is a fun simulation game where you have take part in a 48 hr game jam and have to finish the game within 48 hr timer in the background. You can choose from 3 different modes to play from whichever suits you best. 

=> Controls are simple and there is not much you can control in this simulation. Game-play depends upon your luck and the initial choice you make in the game.

=> Try different modes and try to achieve the best rating you can get.

(Game-play works as, the more time you invest in the game jam the more better the ratings will be but it might also create a chance of missing the submissions. The amount of time left directly affects your ratings for the game.)

== That's all, Try it and I hope you like the game.
